title: Excess Expenditure Appropriation Act, 2016
content:
Excess Expenditure Appropriation [No. 48 of 2016 1119
GOVERNMENT OF ZAMBIA
ACT
No. 48 of 2016
Date of Assent: 27th December, 2016
An Act to approve the excess expenditure of monies
aggregating seven billion, four hundred and three million,
seven hundred thousand kwacha.
[27th December, 2016
ENACTED by the Parliament of Zambia. Enactment
1. This Act may be cited as the Excess Expenditure Short Title
Appropriation Act, 2016.
2. The expenditure on the services of the Republic during the
Appropriation
financial year ending on 31st December, 2016, of the monies
indicated in respect of the services in the third column of the
Schedule being expenditure in excess of the monies appropriated
for the services by the Appropriation Act, 2015, Supplementary Act No. 23 of
2015
Appropriation Act, 2016 and Supplementary Appropriation (2016)
Act No. 36 of
Act, 2016, is approved. 2016
Act No. 41 of
2016

Single copies of this Act can be obtained from the Government Printer,
P.O. Box 30136, 10101 Lusaka. Price K4.00 each.
